SEARCH

Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.facet.FacetsCollector

Packages that use FacetsCollector
Package
Description
org.apache.lucene.facet
Faceted search.
org.apache.lucene.facet.facetset
Provides FacetSets faceting capabilities which allows users to facet on high dimensional field values.
org.apache.lucene.facet.range
Provides range faceting capabilities.
org.apache.lucene.facet.rangeonrange
Provides range on range faceting capabilities.
org.apache.lucene.facet.sortedset
Provides faceting capabilities over facets that were indexed with SortedSetDocValuesFacetField.
org.apache.lucene.facet.taxonomy
Taxonomy of Categories.
